TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StylusDownEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice stylusDevice, int32 timestamp) cil managed

Docs.param: Device instance that the event is associated with.
A timestamp used to disambiguate instances of the event.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed

Docs.param: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
The target to call the handler on.
Docs.summary: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDownEventHandler> and then invokes it. For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets the number of times the tablet pen was tapped.
Docs.value: The number of times the tablet pen was tapped.
